column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Our absolute go to is the steak tare tare and crab cake
column2: for apps. For entrees we have had the filet
column3: fried chicken and pork chop. Surprisingly I think the Pork Chop was my favorite! The staff was so incredibly kind and accommodating
column4: based on these three important criteria: timeliness
column6: and consistency. But to the biggest delight was the level of service they offered every customer in the resraurant. We last came here for our engagement dinner celebration and they treated us like we were dining royalty! Attached is a Instagram snap from that night and got much praise from our followers. We highly recommend for special occasions or a random dinner for two. Both ways
column7: you will get consistency and satisfaction from every part of tge dining exoereince.
